findADoc.description: Find a Doc, Japan, is a non-profit providing free, multilingual health information to promote inclusive healthcare.

aboutMe.text:
Hi there! My name is Gustavo Minetoma

I'm a Full-Stack Engineer based in Kanagawa, Japan. I was born in Japan and moved to Brazil when I was three. My passion for tech began when I first played Tibia many years ago. I watched the gaming industry grow, especially one company: Steam.

At 14, I began my career with a technical course in IT, followed by a year of mandatory service in the army. After that, I pursued a degree in System Analysis and Development at a public college. Once I graduated, I returned to Japan to become financially independent and save funds to continue my tech career.

Today, I'm a Teaching Assistant at Code Chrysalis, where I share my knowledge and experience with students. My goal is to become a Full-Stack Engineer and help Brazilian developers build better lives.
